lines.text: My God man! Your either a Damn fool or a sex maniac! One of these days your going to make more trouble then I can get you out of.
Now what are you getting all riled for? 30 days of sowing on the farm they'll be happy enough to leave town without making a sound. Besides they had it coming, Cousin.
I heard the Judge give you 30 days. I wouldn't count on that.
This is harvest time. They need all the help they can get Baby, for as long as they can get it.
Raise that strap to me white trash and I will tear your ugly heart out!
